Class Setting ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
type

integer Types
name

string The display name of the setting_type
saveName

string The name used to save/load this Setting, no spaces
invisible

boolean Should hide in the ui
value

boolean|integer|number|MathematicalVector2|ColorSetting The value of the setting
default

boolean|integer|number|MathematicalVector2|ColorSetting The default value of the setting
min

integer|number|MathematicalVector2|nil Minimum value of the setting
max

integer|number|MathematicalVector2|nil Maximum value of the setting

integer Types

boolean Should hide in the ui
